name: Little Miss Annie
aura: Increase Ally ATK in in all Battles by 33

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Pretty Nails
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking if the target is under a [Shield] buff. Will ignore 25% of the target's DEF if the target is under a [Shield] buff. 

Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy.

Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 30% if this attack does not kill the target.
skills.name: Hollow Doll

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF if the target has higher DEF than this Champion. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 25% of the damage inflicted if the target has higher MAX HP than this Champion.

Will repeat attack a second time if the target has both higher DEF and higher MAX HP than this Champion.
skills.name: Playdate
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc: When revived, attacks the enemy that killed this Champion with the default Skill. Also fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 25% and places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 50% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.
skills.name: Toys Don't Die [P]

skills.desc:
Each hit has a 50% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 5% and a 100% chance of decreasing the target's MAX HP by 5% of the damage inflicted when attacking enemies under [Heal Reduction] debuffs.

Also heals this Champion by 5% of the damage inflicted when attacking enemies under [Heal Reduction] debuffs.

[Will not heal from damage inflicted by Masteries.]
skills.name: Magical Heart [P]
